metadata.description: Official skills from Bria AI for controllable image generation and editing - fine-grained control over generation, object-level editing, background removal, VGL structured prompts, and image utilities

plugins.name: bria-ai
plugins.description: Controllable image generation and editing with Bria.ai commercially-safe AI models - edit by text instruction, mask specific regions, add/replace/remove objects, control lighting/season/style independently, RMBG-2.0 background removal, and pipeline workflows

plugins.description: Maximum control over AI image generation - structured VGL JSON that explicitly defines every visual attribute: object placement, lighting direction, camera angle, composition, color scheme, and artistic style for deterministic, reproducible results
